Field.Heading: Search parameter
Field.Help: Search for all units that has a specific parameter value or unit-id, or even parts of the search-string

Field.Heading: Custom search parameter
Field.Help: This custom search parameter is remembered as long as you do not go away from this page.

Field.Heading: Add new search parameter
Field.Help: Refine your search by adding custom search parameters. Type into the text field and you will be able to choose among autocompleted parameters within the current unit type.

Field.Heading: Limit
Field.Help: Limit the number of search result. Default is 100 entries.

Field.Heading: Unit
Field.Help: Specify a specific unit-id or even a part of a unit-id.
